name: Nexus Chain
description: What is the Nexus Chain The Nexus chain is a unique blend of decentralized and centralized crypto ecosystems, encompassing its own blockchain, a centralized exchange (CeX), DAO governance, as well as NFTs and an NFT marketplace. This amalgamation of features provides users with a diverse and intriguing ecosystem. What makes your Nexus Chain unique? Featuring a next-gen CEX and its own blockchain boasting extremely high TPS and low transaction fees, the Nexus chain stands out with its uniqueness. This distinctiveness is further accentuated by various aspects of NFTs and their use cases. History of Nexus Chain On August 14th, at 17:00 UTC, we successfully launched our token with a market capitalization of 150k. Since then, we have attracted a significant number of new holders, experienced price growth, and gained traction in trending across major platforms. Whatâ€™s next for Nexus Chain Our official CEX launch, blockchain faucet, testnet, mainnet deployment, industry-leading partnerships, and the prospect of a new all-time high (ATH) are all on the horizon. What can Nexus Chain (wNexus) be used for? Token can be used to trade NFTs at our marketplace, to pay the listing fee at CeX and various other places.
